articles.title: Blinken heads back to China, with a threat over military aid to Russia - POLITICO Europe

articles.content: Reports have long circulated that China has been sending everything from vehicles to bullet-proof vests to Russia for use in its war against Ukraine, with the dual-use technology having both civilian… [+1105 chars]
